item.text: So, since Christ suffered in the flesh, you also arm yourselves with the same attitude because the one who has suffered in the flesh has finished with sin,

<st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> that he <st data-num="980" class="">spends</st> the <st data-num="1954" class="">rest</st> of his <st data-num="5550" class="">time</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">on</st> <st data-num="4561" class="">earth</st> concerned about the <st data-num="2307" class="">will</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> and <st data-num="3371" class="">not</st> <st data-num="444" class="">human</st> <st data-num="1939" class="">desires</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> the <st data-num="5550" class="">time</st> that has <st data-num="3928" class="">passed</st> was <st data-num="713" class="">sufficient</st> for you to <st data-num="2716" class="">do</st> what the <st data-num="1484" class="">non-Christians</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1013" class="">desire</st>.<n id="2" /> You <st data-num="4198" class="">lived</st> then<n id="3" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="766" class="">debauchery</st>, <st data-num="1939">evil desires</st>, <st data-num="3632" class="">drunkenness</st>, <st data-num="2970" class="">carousing</st>, <st data-num="4224">drinking bouts</st>,<n id="4" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="111" class="">wanton</st> <st data-num="1495" class="">idolatries</st>.<n id="5" />

<st data-num="1722 3739">So</st><n id="1" /> they are <st data-num="3579" class="">astonished</st><n id="2" /> when <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4936">rush with</st> them <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="846" class="">same</st> <st data-num="401" class="">flood</st> of <st data-num="810" class="">wickedness</st>, and they <st data-num="987" class="">vilify</st> you.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="3739" class="">They</st> will <st data-num="591" class="">face</st> a <st data-num="3056" class="">reckoning</st> before<n id="1" /> Jesus Christ<n id="2" /> who <st data-num="2192">stands</st> <st data-num="2093" class="">ready</st> to <st data-num="2919" class="">judge</st> the <st data-num="2198" class="">living</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="3498" class="">dead</st>.

Now it was for this very purpose that the gospel was preached to those who are now dead, so that though they were judged in the flesh by human standards they may live spiritually by Godâ€™s standards.
For the culmination of all things is near. So be self-controlled and sober-minded for the sake of prayer.
Above all keep your love for one another fervent because love covers a multitude of sins.

<st data-num="5382">Show hospitality</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="240">one another</st> <st data-num="427" class="">without</st> <st data-num="1112" class="">complaining</st>.

<st data-num="2531" class="">Just as</st> <st data-num="1538" class="">each one</st> has <st data-num="2983" class="">received</st> a <st data-num="5486" class="">gift</st>, use <st data-num="846" class="">it</st> to <st data-num="1247" class="">serve</st> <st data-num="1438">one another</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="5613" class="">as</st> <st data-num="2570" class="">good</st> <st data-num="3623" class="">stewards</st> of the <st data-num="4164" class="">varied</st> <st data-num="5485" class="">grace</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>.

Whoever speaks, let it be with Godâ€™s words. Whoever serves, do so with the strength that God supplies, so that in everything God will be glorified through Jesus Christ. To him belong the glory and the power forever and ever. Amen.
Dear friends, do not be astonished that a trial by fire is occurring among you, as though something strange were happening to you.

<st data-num="235" class="">But</st> <st data-num="5463" class="">rejoice</st> <st data-num="2526" class="">in the degree</st> that you have <st data-num="2841" class="">shared</st> in the <st data-num="3804" class="">sufferings</st> of <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>, <st data-num="2443">so that</st> when <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="1391" class="">glory</st> is <st data-num="602" class="">revealed</st><n id="1" /> you may <st data-num="2532">also</st> <st data-num="5463" class="">rejoice</st> and be <st data-num="21">glad</st>.<n id="2" />
If you are insulted for the name of Christ, you are blessed, because the Spirit of glory, who is the Spirit of God, rests on you.

<st data-num="1063">But</st> let <st data-num="3361 5100">none</st> of <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="3958" class="">suffer</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">as</st> a <st data-num="5406" class="">murderer</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="2812" class="">thief</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="2555" class="">criminal</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">as</st> a <st data-num="244" class="">troublemaker</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> you suffer <st data-num="5613" class="">as</st> a <st data-num="5546" class="">Christian</st>,<n id="1" /> do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> be <st data-num="153" class="">ashamed</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> <st data-num="1392" class="">glorify</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> that you bear <st data-num="3778">such</st> a <st data-num="3686" class="">name</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="3754" class="">For</st> it is <st data-num="2540" class="">time</st> for <st data-num="2917" class="">judgment</st> to <st data-num="757">begin</st>, starting <st data-num="575" class="">with</st> the <st data-num="3624" class="">house</st><n id="1" /> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>. <st data-num="1161" class="">And</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> it <st data-num="4413">starts</st> <st data-num="575" class="">with</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st>, <st data-num="5101" class="">what</st> will be the <st data-num="5056" class="">fate</st><n id="2" /> of those who are <st data-num="544" class="">disobedient</st> to the <st data-num="2098" class="">gospel</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>?
And if the righteous are barely saved, what will become of the ungodly and sinners?
So then let those who suffer according to the will of God entrust their souls to a faithful Creator as they do good.
